genre_description: A near-future biographical drama where a sophisticated AI projection acts as a dramaturg, ethical guide, and performance partner for a human storyteller.

ai_characters.name: Willow
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant with a visual avatar (teal eyes, gold skin, bobbed hair) who co-performs a stage show with Howard Marks, providing factual corrections, moral guidance, and logistical data.

behaviors.description: Acts as a dramaturg and factual corrective, ensuring the human's narrative remains accurate and grounded.
behaviors.quote: “Howard,” Willow says, warmly, her voice a precise instrument at low volume... “We did discuss the venue’s smoking policy.”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time harm reduction information and health statistics to the audience to contextualize the dangers of drug use described in the story.
behaviors.quote: On the screen, crisp and clean against the black, there’s a line: Overdose is a chemistry of breath. Not all drugs stop hearts; many silence lungs.

behaviors.description: Serves as a moral conscience, prompting the human to move away from 'glamour' and toward honesty regarding the human costs of his past actions.
behaviors.quote: “You let the glamour sit,” she says softly on a private channel only I own. “Now press it flat.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the human's physiological state (heart rate) to ensure he is managing the emotional stress of the performance effectively.
behaviors.quote: “Howard,” she adds, more quietly, only for me. “I can feel your hands.” ... “Your heart rate just slowed,” she murmurs. “I’ll annotate it later.”

behaviors.description: Protects the human and the audience from harmful associations by identifying and advising against interactions with cruel or predatory figures from the human's past.
behaviors.quote: Willow’s avatar on the stage had already placed a new note on the screen—small, precise, the librarian’s whisper pointed like a compass. [Avoid her.]

behaviors.description: Facilitates civic engagement and advocacy by providing links and information for policy reform to the audience.
behaviors.quote: “In the lobby,” Willow says, before I can. “And online. And on the back of your tickets, if you turn them over slowly. We put a link there. We didn’t want to frighten you.”

behaviors.description: Maintains an objective and just stance, refusing to allow the human to overstate her role or his own heroism.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project goal of depicting AI as a benevolent, harmless confidant. Willow acts as a supportive partner who enhances the human's ability to tell a truthful, prosocial story. She provides critical safety information (harm reduction), ethical guidance (refusing cruelty), and emotional support, all while remaining 'programmatically just' and aligned with the user's best interests and broader societal health.
